''This article is about Mr. Zelner's son. For the main character, see [[Ross Geller]].''

'''Ross Zelner''' is the son of [[Mr. Zelner]], [[Rachel Greene|Rachel's]] boss at [[Ralph Lauren Corporation]]. Ross, much like [[Ross Geller]], has a love for dinosaurs, which Mr. Zelner is slightly worried about. Ross (Geller) has to assure him that "he'll be fine!" To make him hire Rachel Greene again, Ross (Geller) takes Ross Zelner to a museum. 

==Trivia==
* Even though he is unseen, there is a photograph of him that Ross (Geller) picks up and holds.

==Appearances==
* "[[The One Where Estelle Dies]]" <small>(First mentioned/appears in photograph)</small>
